title: **Patch 5.19** LoL Patcher keeps Scanning Files. Please Help Riot . ** ON A MAC**
body:
OK.......... So I get on my **Mac** to play LoL, I just saw the ****** PATCH 5.19** pop-up in my screen. So this being seen I then pray to Gods life that the file scanning thing won't happen. Well......... THAT DIDN'T WORK. If you can help us with these kind of things then can you do it As Soon As Possible. Thanks for reading this message .

Sincerely, 

LoL Players

Edit: I downloaded a new patcher and left it to download overnight and LoL started to work :) Finally after 2 months............

replies.body:
Well, on my GF's Mac, the client can't be launched, 'cause the patch is stucked on 1/4. How can she resolve?

Sorry for bad eng. :\
Mine was taking a while too.  :/
